short_summary: In-Car Printers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) Program in support of the RCMP Electronic Summary Offence Ticketing Program has a requirement for in-car mobile printers and vehicle adapters.
full_summary:
**Tender Title: *In-Car Printers for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (2022)***

**Reference Number: *SSC-23-00020933:T***

**Posting Date: *February 2, 2023***

**Closing Date:** *December 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EST*

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) Program is seeking bids for in-car mobile printers and vehicle adapters. The contract is for the supply and delivery of 1,032 initial units, with the option to purchase up to an additional 4,000 units over a two-year period, with two one-year options to extend.

**Key Requirements:**

* The in-car mobile printers, batteries, and vehicle adapters must meet the technical specifications outlined in Annex A.
* The estimated quantity of commodities is 5,032 units.
* The contract duration is two years with two one-year options to extend.
* Deliveries are required on an as-and-when-requested basis.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**
This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers. Evaluation will be based on the technical specifications outlined in Annex A, price, and other relevant criteria.

**Contracting Entity:**
The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada, 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact Katherine Ikeson, Katherine.Ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca, 613-298-2147.

**Attachments:**
None. 

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
